changelog.zh:
- 新增：全平台302重定向自动处理（支持多层重定向，最多3层）
- 新增：智能URL检测，直接流地址跳过302解析，节约时间
- 新增：302重定向缓存机制（24小时有效期），大幅提升重复播放速度
- 新增：TV端原生日志桥接系统，原生日志输出到文件便于调试
- 新增：播放全流程详细日志（302解析、播放器初始化、错误处理等）
- 新增：Windows端播放器菜单按钮，快速调出频道分类
- 优化：统一TV端302解析代码，提取RedirectResolver工具类
- 优化：多源检测时使用302解析缓存，检测即缓存，播放0延迟
- 优化：移除播放器销毁时的缓存清除，保留缓存提升体验
- 修复：URL中$符号导致的播放失败问题
- 修复：Wakelock初始化时序问题，避免启动错误
changelog.en:
- Added: Cross-platform 302 redirect auto-handling (supports multi-layer redirects, max 3 layers)
- Added: Smart URL detection, direct stream URLs skip 302 resolution to save time
- Added: 302 redirect caching mechanism (24-hour validity), significantly faster repeat playback
- Added: Native log bridging system for Android TV, outputs native logs to file for debugging
- Added: Comprehensive playback logging (302 resolution, player init, error handling)
- Added: Menu button in Windows player for quick access to channel categories
- Improved: Unified TV 302 resolution code, extracted RedirectResolver utility class
- Improved: Multi-source detection uses 302 cache, detection caches URL, playback has 0 delay
- Improved: Removed cache clearing on player destroy, retains cache for better experience
- Fixed: Playback failure caused by $ symbol in URLs
- Fixed: Wakelock initialization timing issue to avoid startup errors
